Service Details: - Expands end-of-life choices, improves quality of dying and helps Canadians avoid unwanted suffering, and achieve quality in dying- Advocates for compassionate end-of-life choices and works to accurately inform the public about the constitutional right of physician-assisted dying- Provides legal end-of-life options and the importance of advance care planning- Provides personal support to adults suffering greatly from a grievous and irremediable illness or medical condition, and who wish to die on their own terms- Advocates for strong patient rights legislation and support those whose rights are being violated
